channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Internet’s Future Is Looking Bleaker By the Day
item.description: While Meta enacts the X playbook, TikTok is on the verge of being declared illegal. Who wins? Probably not internet users.

item.title: Google’s Daily Listen AI feature generates a podcast based on your Discover feed
item.description: Google is testing a new “Daily Listen” feature that automatically generates a podcast based on your Discover feed. The company confirmed to TechCrunch...

item.title: Doublepoint launches free Apple Watch app to control devices with hand gestures
item.description: Finnish startup Doublepoint launched its free app, WowMouse, for the Apple Watch this week at CES 2025. The app uses the wearable’s sensors, compass, ...

item.title: Google searches for deleting Facebook, Instagram explode after Meta ends fact-checking
item.description: Google searches for how to cancel and delete Facebook, Instagram, and Threads accounts have seen explosive rises in the U.S. since Meta CEO Mark Zucke...

item.title: Best Organic Mattress & Bedding of 2025: Nontoxic, Natural Sleep
item.description: These nontoxic beds and bedsheets are easier on the environment and your health—and they feel like a dream.

item.title: Watch Duty surpasses ChatGPT as top free app on App Store as California fires spread
item.description: Watch Duty, an app to track wildfires with live maps and alerts, has become the No. 1 free app in Apple’s App Store as of Wednesday morning. The fire-...

item.title: The Fanciful, Mechanical, Monumental Spectacle of CES 2025
item.description: WIRED contributing photographer Tristan deBrauwere takes us behind the scenes at the largest consumer tech show in the world.

item.title: The 31 Best Gadgets From CES 2025 You Can Buy Right Now
item.description: From smartphones to smart glasses, here’s everything announced at this year's big tech trade show that you can actually order—or preorder—today.

item.title: PowerSchool says hackers stole students’ sensitive data, including Social Security numbers, in data breach
item.description: In an FAQ obtained by TechCrunch, PowerSchool confirms it negotiated with the threat actors responsible for the breach. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights ...

item.title: MAGA Is Blaming DEI for the California Wildfires
item.description: Rather than months without rain or the effects of climate change, figures like Elon Musk and Donald Trump Jr. are pointing to a familiar scapegoat as ...
